title: Script ID - Sign/hand painted style
content:
Hello...  
99% sure this was not a custom job, digital or otherwise.  
My first instinct was LHF, but, no luck there.  
Help appreciated.  
RW

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [3857104123\_6859992b6e.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20090828032719/http:/typophile.com/files/3857104123_6859992b6e.jpg) | 98.8 KB |
author: RichardWick

comments.content: If it’s a font, I’ve never seen it before. Closest I can get is [Casey](http://web.archive.org/web/20090828032719/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/font_bureau/casey/?&sample_text=Veritas%20&sample_size=96), but she’s much more buxom.

hello mr. coles  
contacted the designer behind that piece, waiting to hear back on an ID.  
will post here.

the face is a skewed and stretched version of this, with the inline effect removed....so, custom to some level.  
good call on that designer’s part (bradley askew) in modifying it

[http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/letraset/inscription/inscription/](http://web.archive.org/web/20090828032719/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/letraset/inscription/inscription/ "http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/letraset/inscription/inscription/")
